What are the treatments for WaterhouseFriderichsen syndrome ?,How might Waterhouse-Friderichsen syndrome be treated? Treatment may include antibiotics and glucocorticoids.  Other treatment is symptomatic and supportive.,GARD,WaterhouseFriderichsen syndrome
